column1: #Text=Takes a while to collect this much seaweed .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Sokka , we 've got ta take out those battlements !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 've got an idea .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " You two take out that battlement .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I know I 've made some bad choices , but today , I 'm gon na set things right .
